title: Sanctuary of Aphrodite/Isis
description: A sanctuary on the south slope of the Acropolis of Athens, dedicated to Aphrodite in the Classical period and associated with Isis from the late first century BC. A temple was built in the Hadrianic period.

properties.description: Representative point location derived from Google Earth imagery and plans in Walker 1979.
properties.title: Imagery location: Sanctuary of Aphrodite/Isis
